Key Match Events: India won by 4 wickets (with 0 balls remaining)
Virat Kohli scored a crucial 82* off 53 balls
Hardik Pandya contributed 40 runs off 37 balls
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 32 runs
Bhuvneshwar Kumar bowled economically with figures of 1/22 in 4 overs
Shaheen Afridi dismissed KL Rahul and Rohit Sharma early in the innings
Haris Rauf bowled a crucial spell taking 2 wickets for 36 runs
Shan Masood scored 52* off 42 balls for Pakistan
Iftikhar Ahmed scored 51 off 34 balls for Pakistan
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of chasing a target
Babar Azam mentioned he would have preferred to bowl first
India's batting strength was highlighted against Pakistan's bowling prowess
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma carried Virat Kohli on his shoulders after the win
Virat Kohli expressed his excitement and pride in his performance
Babar Azam had an animated discussion with the umpires regarding a no-ball decision
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain threatened to wash out the game but created a thrilling atmosphere
The pitch had significant swing and bounce due to weather conditions
Over 90,000 spectators attended the match at the MCG
A free hit ball hit the stumps and India took three runs, causing controversy
